// program shows all invoices of the selected DEBTOR_HELLER
// if the user choose "including pending batches / schedules" we have
// to merge 3 tables together. To handle this, we use a SQL-union !

ExpSyntax.val: RTrim ({1,26})&' cast (sum (INVO_AACTUALH) as decimal (18,2)),cast (sum (INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal (18,2)),cast (sum (INVO_AACTUALI) as decimal (18,2))'&' from '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/INVO'&' '&Trim ({1,25})

RTrim ({1,27})&' INVO_CURRENCY,cast (sum (INVO_AACTUALI) as decimal (18,2)),cast (sum (INVO_AACTUALH) as decimal (18,2)),cast (sum (INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal (18,2))'&' from '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/INVO'&' '&Trim ({1,25})
RTrim ({1,27})&' and INVO_CURRENCY in (select distinct INVO_CURRENCY from '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/INVO'&' '&Trim ({1,25})&') group by INVO_CURRENCY'

RTrim ({1,29})&''' and (INVO_FINALPAYMENTDATE > '''&DStr ({1,17},'DD.MM.YYYY')&''' or INVO_FINALPAYMENTDATE IS NULL)'

RTrim ({1,30})&' INVO_CURRENCY, cast (sum (INVO_BOOKINGAMOUNTI) as decimal (18,2))'&' from '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/INVO'&' '&Trim ({1,29})&' '&'group by INVO_CURRENCY'

RTrim ({1,31})&' INVO_CURRENCY,cast (sum (INVO_BOOKINGAMOUNTI) as decimal (18,2)),cast (sum (INVO_AINITIALH) as decimal (18,2)),cast (sum (INVO_AINITIALC) as decimal (18,2))'&' from '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/INVO'&' '&Trim ({1,29})
RTrim ({1,31})&' and INVO_CURRENCY in (select distinct INVO_CURRENCY from '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/INVO'&' '&Trim ({1,29})&') group by INVO_CURRENCY'

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT BPIV_INVO_NO, BPIV_AMOUNTCURRINV, INVO_CURRENCY FROM :1/INVO INNER JOIN :1/BPIV ON INVO_NO = BPIV_INVO_NO WHERE INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 AND INVO_BOOKINGDATE <= ':3' AND (INVO_FINALPAYMENTDATE > ':3' OR INVO_FINALPAYMENTDATE IS NULL) AND BPIV_CASHREPORTDATE <= ':3' FOR FETCH ONLY

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM :1/INVO WHERE INVO_DEBC_NO=:2 and INVO_BOOKINGDATE <= ':3' and (INVO_FINALPAYMENTDATE > ':3' or INVO_FINALPAYMENTDATE IS NULL) FOR FETCH ONLY
select count(*) from :1 where ARCH_SCHT_NO = :2 AND ARCH_HYPA_DEPARTMENTNAME = 'HASA' AND ARCH_DOCTYPE = 277 AND ARCH_DATEDELETED IS NULL
